name: Minting Sketches with Ensemble
description: Mackenzie will talk about Ensemble and how to mint sketches.

speakers.name: Mackenzie Davenport
speakers.bio:
I'm Mackenzie Davenport.
I'm the founder of Ensemble, a platform for artists to sell artifacts from their creative process and tell the story of their project.
I'm also a theatre artist and video essayist.
https://mack.page/mack
